scripts.dev:full: concurrently -n api,setup,touch,dashboard,softap,kiosk -c blue,green,yellow,magenta,cyan,white "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev --prefix apps/setup-ui" "npm run dev --prefix apps/touchscreen-ui" "npm run dev:dashboard" "npm run dev:softap" "npm run dev:kiosk"
scripts.dev:dashboard: cross-env PORT=3002 npm run dev --prefix apps/dashboard
scripts.build:ios: npm run generate:ios && cd ios && xcodebuild -project Neuroion.xcodeproj -scheme NeuroionOne -destination 'generic/platform=iOS' -configuration Debug build
